meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Calling Israel's Bluff Benjamin Netanyahu often talks about achieving a lasting peace, but Washington is unsure that he means it and seems ready to call his bluff. News analysis, page A6.
International Studies For the first time, Manhattan has become the most popular destination in the United States for foreign students, a new study shows. Page B3.
Calling Israel's Bluff Benjamin Netanyahu often talks about achieving a lasting peace, but Washington is unsure that he means it and seems ready to call his bluff. News analysis, page A6.
International Studies For the first time, Manhattan has become the most popular destination in the United States for foreign students, a new study shows. Page B3.
Vice President Gore arrived at global warming talks in Japan and said America would ''show increased negotiating flexibility.'' Page A8.
Dylan Joins Establishment Bob Dylan -- yes, Dylan -- joined Lauren Bacall, Charlton Heston, Jessye Norman and Edward Villella as recipients of the 1997 Kennedy Center Honors. Page A20.
Giants and Jets Diverge In games vital to their playoff chances, the Giants defeated the Eagles, 31-21, and the Jets lost to the Colts, 22-14. SportsMonday, page C1.
